frontmatter.title: Passing Data From Controller to Template

CourseQuery.html:
Course Overview

This course is for developers who want to start developing with Magento 2. The course covers basics so you can get up to speed with Magento 2 platform and architecture.

Each lesson provides a video tutorial as well as written content material with the download link to a lesson's source code.

Are you ready to start your Mage Mastery journey? Start an Introduction lesson of the Magento 2 for Beginners course and follow the course lesson-by-lesson. You will enjoy it.

Lessons are added every Thursday.
